title: Kalista's Q-Right click mechanic to jump walls is buggy.
body: Works rarely for some reason, however the dash range is pretty big. Can we have some smoothing out or make it less punishable (as in make it more likely to succeed rather than faceplant).

replies.body: Theirs very limited spots this can be done. :l I hope hope it isn't a bug though, I'd hate for this to be fixed, it's fun jumping between walls lol.
It's not a bug to be able to jump walls, but as for the OP, it's not designed to be able to jump many of the slightly thicker walls, only the extremely thin ones.
It's still pretty unforgiving in that it tends to fail a lot if you are even off by a fraction.

Same with most jumps honestly.

I fail jumps as Nidalee all the time
Yeah Nidalees spots are really bad atm too aye, like pinpoint precision would not make in a clutch if my life depended on it.
